job.name: lana
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # starver TFG20b # starver TFG19k # setenv NODEBUG yes # setup 64b # setup gcc # setup gcc631 # setup gcc # starver dev # starver .DEV2 # starver TFG20k # starver TFG22b starver TFG22c # chck adev # setup gcc # setup debug # starver adev set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` setenv STARFPE NO if ("$f" == "") then if (-r $logFile) rm $logFile # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,B2021,trgd,Tpx,LaserIT,StiCA,StiKFVertex,CorrY,OGridLeakFull,OSpaceZ2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-evout","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} # root4star -q -b -x 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,P2021a,trgd,Tpx,LaserIT,StiCA,CorrY,OGridLeakFull,OSpaceZ2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-evout,MuDst","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,B2020,trgd,Tpx,LaserIT,StiCA,StiKFVertex,CorrY,OGridLeakFull,OSpaceZ2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-evout","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} # root4star -q -b -x 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,B2021a,trgd,Tpx,LaserIT,StiCA,CorrY,OGridLeakFull,OSpaceZ2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-evout,-picoDst,-picoEvt,-picoWrite","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C(99999,"lana,B2022a,trgd,Tpx,LaserIT,StiCA,CorrY,OGridLeakFull,OSpaceZ2,analysis,NoHistos,NoRunco,-evout,-picoDst,-picoEvt,-picoWrite","'${evtsFile}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
